name: Corazón de León
T1D: Corazon adds its Charisma modifier to the damage roll for its longsword attacks (included in the attack).
T2D: This spell is a minor Magical trick that novice spellcasters use for practice. You create one of the following Magical Effects within range.
T3D: Slick grease covers the ground in a 10-foot square centered on a point within range and turns it into difficult terrain for the duration. When the grease appears, each creature standing in its area must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or fall prone. A creature that enters the area or ends its turn there must also succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or fall prone.
T4D: Corazon makes two attacks: one with its hand crossbow and one with its longsword.
A1D:
Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit:
9 (1d8 + 5) slashing damage, or 10 (1d10 + 5) slashing damage if used with two hands.
A2D: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.
